title: 📊 Market Intel — Feb 17, 2026 8:00 PM ET
content:
# 📊 Market Intel Report — Tuesday, Feb 17, 2026 @ 8:00 PM ET

**Top Headlines: S&P 500 & Nasdaq grind to new highs | Anthropic drops Claude Sonnet 4.6 | Abu Dhabi funds hold $1B+ in Bitcoin ETFs | Stripe's Bridge wins bank charter | Tesla robotaxis crash 4x more than humans | Gold near $4,900**

---

## 🔥 Top Trending

- **Markets quietly green** — S&P 500 +0.10% (6,843), Nasdaq +0.14% (22,578), Dow +0.07% (49,533). Low volatility day, VIX down 4.3% to 20.29
- **Anthropic launches Claude Sonnet 4.6** — #1 on Hacker News with 820 pts & 714 comments. Major AI model release dominating tech discourse
- **Abu Dhabi wealth funds hold $1B+ in Bitcoin ETFs** — Mubadala & Al Warda increased IBIT exposure in Q4 2025 (CoinDesk)
- **Stripe's Bridge wins national bank trust charter** — Stablecoin firm gets federal banking license for issuing/managing stablecoins
- **Tesla robotaxis crashing 4x more than humans** — Trending on HN, regulatory pressure potential

---

## 📈 Stock Movers

- **S&P 500:** 6,843.22 (+0.10%) | **Nasdaq:** 22,578.38 (+0.14%) | **Dow:** 49,533.19 (+0.07%)
- **Russell 2000:** 2,646.59 (flat) — small caps lagging
- **DAX:** 24,998.40 (+0.80%) — Europe outperforming US
- **FTSE 100:** 10,556.17 (+0.79%) — UK strong
- **Nikkei 225:** 57,113.71 (+0.97%) — Japan leading Asia
- **Shanghai Composite:** 4,082.07 (-1.26%) — China weak
- **VIX:** 20.29 (-4.29%) — fear gauge dropping
- **Sector watch:** Technology YTD -4.95% (still underwater)
- **Tickers in focus:** MU (Micron 2026 price targets), MTSI (MACOM surged on strong results), eToro +14% on record Q4 profit

---

## 💰 Crypto & Digital Assets

- **Abu Dhabi sovereign wealth funds** topped $1B in BlackRock's IBIT (Bitcoin ETF) — bought the dip in Q4
- **Stripe's Bridge** wins initial approval for national bank trust charter — federal stablecoin oversight incoming
- **Dragonfly** raises $650M for crypto VC Fund IV despite "bear market gloom" — alongside a16z, Paradigm
- **eToro** shares jump 14% after record Q4 profit despite crypto revenue drop — outperforming Robinhood & Coinbase
- **BitGo** flagged as potential Wall Street acquisition target by Compass Point & Canaccord
- **Nakamoto** acquiring BTC Inc & UTXO in $107M all-stock deal — Bitcoin treasury consolidation play
- **Elemental Royalty** paying dividends in Tether's tokenized gold — first company to do so
- **Dollar Index:** 97.11 (-0.05%) — weak dollar supports crypto

---

## 🔵 Bloomberg

- Bloomberg blocked (bot detection), but Reuters data shows:
- **Global equities broadly green** — US, Europe, Japan all positive
- **Brent Crude:** $67.38 (-0.06%) — oil stable
- **Gold:** $4,895 (-0.22%) — hovering near record highs
- **10Y Treasury Yield:** 4.052% (-0.10%) — rates slightly lower
- **EUR/USD:** 1.1855 — euro strong vs dollar
- **USD/JPY:** 153.10 — yen slightly stronger

---

- Abu Dhabi sovereign wealth fund Bitcoin ETF holdings likely buzzing in crypto Twitter

- **WSB Earnings Thread** (2/16-2/20) pinned — 241 upvotes, 515 comments. Earnings season focus
- **"What Are Your Moves Tomorrow"** daily thread active — typical pre-market positioning discussion
- **r/stocks:** Portfolio discussion thread active, quarterly rebalancing season
- **r/cryptocurrency:** Daily discussion thread, standard sentiment monitoring

## 🚀 Tesla / SpaceX / Elon

- **Tesla robotaxis crashing at 4x human rate** — Gizmodo report trending on Hacker News. Regulatory risk for Tesla's autonomous driving ambitions
- No major SpaceX launch news today
- DOGE/government efficiency news quiet today

---

## 💻 AI & Tech

- **Anthropic launches Claude Sonnet 4.6** — Massive HN engagement (820 pts, 714 comments). New model in the Claude 4.x family
- **BarraCUDA** — Open-source CUDA compiler targeting AMD GPUs (125 pts on HN). Could democratize GPU computing beyond NVIDIA
- **Async/Await on the GPU** — Novel GPU programming paradigm gaining attention (148 pts)
- **GrapheneOS** privacy-focused mobile OS post dominating HN (#1 with 1,048 pts)
- **Structured AI (YC F25)** hiring — YC still betting big on AI startups

---

## 🏈 Sports & Betting

**NBA — Thursday Feb 19 slate:**
- **Rockets (33-20) @ Hornets (26-29)** — HOU -2.5, O/U 215.5. KD (25.8 PPG) vs LaMelo (19.3 PPG)
- **Nets (15-38) @ Cavaliers (34-21)** — CLE -15.5, O/U 230.5. Mitchell (29.0 PPG) massive favorite
- **Hawks (26-30) @ 76ers (30-24)** — Philly home, tickets from $9

**NCAA Basketball** — Full schedule of men's and women's games live on ESPN
**Winter Olympics** — Milan-Cortina 2026 coverage ramping up on ESPN

- **Silver:** $72.89 (-0.88%)
- **Copper:** $5.67 (+0.56%) — industrial demand signal
- **Crude Oil (WTI):** $62.13 (-0.21%) | **Brent:** $67.38 (-0.06%)
- **Natural Gas:** $3.04 (+0.40%)
- **10Y Treasury:** 4.052% — slightly lower
- **30Y Treasury:** 4.683% (-0.32%)
- **5Y Treasury:** 3.621% (+0.33%)
- **USD Index:** 97.11 (-0.05%) — dollar weak, supporting risk assets
- **EUR/USD:** 1.1855 | **USD/JPY:** 153.10
- Presidents' Day holiday was yesterday — thin volume day
